segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is just pouring out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, and she hasn’t even noticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, and she’s just acting like everything is fine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on without anyone doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool the boy is on looks like it’s about to collapse any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this without feeling a little panicked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, so innocent and unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall and ruin everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
